pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose

Use common config file for both CP and filter-chain

commit.message:
filter: jwt: Validate from checkrequest info

Filter chain doesn't need to load openapi defs separately. All
required details will be attached to the checkrequest from envoy
in ContextAttributes map

filter: conf: Use common config.toml

There is no point in using separate config file for filter chain.

nodes.bodyText:
If multiple http methods are involved with a single path, the filter-core gets a space separated set of Methods (in a pending PR).
Hence shall we split this using space and add a resource for each method.
Lets use the existing distribution name we used for microgateway runtime

commit.message:
dist: Change distribution name

dist naming pattern should be similar to old dist

filter: Support multi method resources

If single resource definition contains multiple http methods gw
will return multiple methods as the resoruce list to match. These
should be regonized and built as multiple resource configurations
in filter chain.
